name: Verona
description:
Verona is a 2d platformer in wich you will have to swich between 2 characters in love to progress in levels. Indeed each character see different elements of the game. And all of that in a world divided in two colors who hates each other.

Arrows to move, up arrow or Space to jump, F to swich character. The game is compatible with a controller (Xbox, PS4...).
